actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to establish the Food and Drug Administration by law, and for other purposes.
short_title: Food and Drug Administration Act of 1987
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Food and Drug Administration Act of 1987 - Establishes the Food and Drug Administration within the Department of Health and Human Services as a matter of law. States that the Commissioner of Food and Drugs shall be appointed by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate and shall report to the Secretary of Health and Human Services as specified.

titles.title: Food and Drug Administration Act of 1987
A bill to establish the Food and Drug Administration by law, and for other purposes.
